channel.title: 毕少侠
channel.description: 博客：探索、发现、分享 By geekswg-[毕少侠]

item.title: Hugo添加Pjax功能支持
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/posts/2024/hugo-pjax-support/cover.webp" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">Hugo是一个使用Go语言构建的静态网站生成器，它的速度非常快，并且具有强大的主题支持和灵活的定制选项。通过Hugo，你可以轻松地构建和管理博客网站，并且添加PJAX功能也非常简单。</div>
 </div>
</div><br>
当你希望你的博客网站加载更快、更平滑，同时又想要保持简洁的用户体验时，<code>PJAX</code>（PushState + Ajax）就是一个很好的选择。Hugo是一个快速、灵活的静态网站生成器，它提供了添加PJAX功能的简便方法。在这篇博客中，我将向你介绍如何使用Hugo为你的博客网站添加PJAX功能。</p>
<h2 id="什么是pjax" class="heading-element"><span>什么是PJAX？</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88%e6%98%afpjax" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>PJAX是一种通过<code>Ajax</code>和HTML5 History API来实现无刷新页面加载的技术。当用户点击链接时，PJAX会使用Ajax从服务器加载页面的一部分，然后使用History API来更新浏览器的URL，使其看起来像是完整加载了一个新页面。这种方式可以显著提高网站的加载速度，并提升用户体验。<br>
<code>Pjax</code> = <code>Ajax</code> + <code>pushState</code>。当用户进行超链请求时，Pjax 会拦截请求，然后触发 Ajax 请求和 pushState。其中，Ajax 使你的页面局部刷新，pushState 用于修改 URL 而不跳转页面，从而实现不跳转页面局部刷新的功能。</p>
<h2 id="pjax在hugo中的使用" class="heading-element"><span>PJAX在Hugo中的使用</span>
 <a href="#pjax%e5%9c%a8hugo%e4%b8%ad%e7%9a%84%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>PJAX实现有两大版本，一种是基于<code>JavaScript</code>的版本，另一种是基于<code>jQuery</code>的版本。</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/MoOx/pjax"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">MoOx/pjax<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 基于<code>JavaScript</code>的版本，推荐使用！</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/defunkt/jquery-pjax"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">defunkt/jquery-pjax<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://github.com/welefen/pjax"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">welefen/pjax<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>。依赖<code>jQuery</code>，不推荐使用。</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="安装pjax" class="heading-element"><span>安装PJAX</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85pjax" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>本文以 <a href="https://github.com/MoOx/pjax"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">MoOx/pjax<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 为例，介绍如何在Hugo中添加PJAX功能。<br>
首先，在你的Hugo项目中安装<code>pjax</code>，使用cdn方式安装：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pjax/pjax.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="配置pjax页面demo" class="heading-element"><span>配置PJAX页面demo</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aepjax%e9%a1%b5%e9%9d%a2demo" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">html</span> <span class="na">lang</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;en&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">head</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">meta</span> <span class="na">charset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;UTF-8&#34;</span> <span class="p">/&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">title</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>Liuyib&#39;s Blog<span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">title</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">meta</span> <span class="na">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;description&#34;</span> <span class="na">content</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;Liuyib&#39;s Blog&#34;</span> <span class="p">/&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">head</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">body</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">header</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;header&#34;</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;header&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 顶部栏...
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">header</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">main</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;main&#34;</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;main&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 主体部分...
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">main</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">footer</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;footer&#34;</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;footer&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 底部栏...
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">footer</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">body</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">html</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>每次切换页面时，title 会随之改变，header 和 footer 一般不变，而 main 是网站的主体部分，也会改变。因此，我们可以这样来使用 Pjax：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">var pjax = new Pjax({
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> // 这里填写页面中改变的部分（和 CSS 选择器用法一样）
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> selectors: [&#34;head title&#34;, &#34;#main&#34;],
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">});</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="重载js" class="heading-element"><span>重载JS</span>
 <a href="#%e9%87%8d%e8%bd%bdjs" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>如果页面中引入了JS文件，那么切换页面时，这些JS文件也会被重新加载。因此，我们需要在切换页面时，重新加载这些JS文件。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">pjax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Pjax</span><span class="p">({</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// 这里填写页面中改变的部分（和 CSS 选择器用法一样）
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">selectors</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;head title&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&#34;.desktop .animate__faster&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;.container&#34;</span><span class="p">],</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Pjax 开始时执行的函数
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">addEventListener</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;pjax:send&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;pjax:send&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">// Pjax 完成之后执行的函数
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">addEventListener</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;pjax:complete&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;pjax:complete&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">pjax_reload</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nx">pjax_reload</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">pjax_js_reload</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;/js/theme.min.js&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">initCustomALink</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nx">pjax_js_reload</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">js_url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">callback</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">bp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">createElement</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;script&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">curProtocol</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">location</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">protocol</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;:&#39;</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">bp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">src</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">js_url</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getElementsByTagName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;script&#39;</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">s</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">parentNode</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">insertBefore</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">bp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">s</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="pjax使用的注意事项" class="heading-element"><span>PJAX使用的注意事项</span>
 <a href="#pjax%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8%e7%9a%84%e6%b3%a8%e6%84%8f%e4%ba%8b%e9%a1%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>注意整个页面的划分和布局，PAJX 只能加载页面中改变的部分，不能加载整个页面，一般的静态的部分不需要重复加载。</li>
<li>注意页面中的 JS 文件，切换页面时，需要重新加载 JS 文件，否则可能出现页面不完整和功能缺失的情况，需要在<code>pjax:complete</code>事件中重载JS。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="pjax的使用场景" class="heading-element"><span>PJAX的使用场景</span>
 <a href="#pjax%e7%9a%84%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8%e5%9c%ba%e6%99%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>在网站运行过程，需要频繁切换页面时。</li>
<li>需要加载大量静态资源时。</li>
<li>需要加载大量动态资源时。</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>例如：网站页面贴边的音乐播放器，我在切换页面时，不需要重新加载音乐播放器，只需要重新加载页面中改变的部分即可。</p>
</blockquote>

item.title: Layui Shortcodes Demo
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/images/posts/featured-image-preview.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">这是介绍一个依赖layui的shortcodes示例，的实现和使用方法</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h2 id="为什么使用layui" class="heading-element"><span>为什么使用Layui</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%ba%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8layui" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>不善前端</li>
<li>ui组件全</li>
<li>符合我的审美</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="tabs-选项卡" class="heading-element"><span>tabs-选项卡</span>
 <a href="#tabs-%e9%80%89%e9%a1%b9%e5%8d%a1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2>
<link href="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">

<script src="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/layui.js"></script><div class="layui-tab layui-tab-card" lay-filter="layui-tabs-demo" >
 <ul class="layui-tab-title"><li class="layui-this" >示例代码</li>
 
 <li>实现</li></ul>
 <div class="layui-tab-content"><div class="layui-tab-item layui-show" ><div class="highlight" title="使用实例代码"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{<span class="p">&lt;</span> <span class="nt">layui-tabs</span> <span class="na">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tabs-2&#34;</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% layui-tab title=&#34;t1&#34; %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">这是t1内容，支持`MD`语法
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% /layui-tab %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{<span class="p">&lt;</span> <span class="nt">layui-tab</span> <span class="na">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;t2&#34;</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>}}这是t2的内容{{<span class="p">&lt;</span> <span class="p">/</span><span class="nt">layui-tab</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{<span class="p">&lt;</span> <span class="p">/</span><span class="nt">layui-tabs</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>}}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></div>
 
 <div class="layui-tab-item"><blockquote>
<p>自定义shortcodes，实现tabs功能，自定义<code>shortcodes</code>请参考<a href="https://gohugo.io/templates/shortcode-templates/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方文档<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>在<code>/lauout/shortcodes/</code>目录下创建<code>layui-tabs.html</code> 和 <code>layui-tab.html</code> 文件，内容如下：</p>
<div class="highlight" title="layui-tabs.html"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">&lt;!-- 引入 layui.css --&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">link</span> <span class="na">href</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/css/layui.css&#34;</span> <span class="na">rel</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;stylesheet&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">&lt;!-- 请勿在项目正式环境中引用该 layui.js 地址 --&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/layui.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- .Page.Scratch.Add &#34;tabset-counter&#34; 1 -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- $tab_set_id := .Get &#34;name&#34; | default (printf &#34;tabset-%s-%d&#34; (.Page.RelPermalink) (.Page.Scratch.Get &#34;tabset-counter&#34;) ) | anchorize -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- $tabs := .Scratch.Get &#34;layui-tabs&#34; -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- if .Inner -}}{{- /* We don&#39;t use the inner content, but Hugo will complain if we don&#39;t reference it. */ -}}{{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab layui-tab-card&#34;</span> <span class="na">lay-filter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;{{ $tab_set_id }}&#34;</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">ul</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab-title&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- range $i, $e := $tabs -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- if (eq $i 0) -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">li</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-this&#34;</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span> {{- trim .title &#34; &#34; -}} <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">li</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{ else }}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">li</span><span class="p">&gt;</span> {{- trim .title &#34; &#34; -}} <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">li</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">ul</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab-content&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- range $i, $e := $tabs -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- if (eq $i 0) -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab-item layui-show&#34;</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- .content -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{ else }}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab-item&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- .content -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight" title="layui-tab.html"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">&lt;!-- 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">参考 hugo-stellar
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">https://github.com/Yharimium/hugo-stellar/blob/main/layouts/shortcodes/mkdocs/tab.html
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">https://github.com/kubernetes/website/blob/main/layouts/shortcodes/tabs.html
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">--&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- $title := cond .IsNamedParams (.Get &#34;title&#34;) (.Get 0) | markdownify -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- $content := .Inner | safeHTML -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- if not (.Parent.Scratch.Get &#34;layui-tabs&#34;) -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{- .Parent.Scratch.Set &#34;layui-tabs&#34; slice -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- end -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{- .Parent.Scratch.Add &#34;layui-tabs&#34; (dict &#34;title&#34; $title &#34;content&#34; $content) -}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;layui-tab-item&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	{{ .Inner }}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></div></div>
</div>

<h3 id="demo" class="heading-element"><span>demo</span>
 <a href="#demo" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3>
<link href="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">

<script src="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/layui.js"></script><div class="layui-tab layui-tab-card" lay-filter="layui-tabs-2" >
 <ul class="layui-tab-title"><li class="layui-this" >t1</li>
 
 <li>t2</li></ul>
 <div class="layui-tab-content"><div class="layui-tab-item layui-show" ><p>这是t1内容，支持<code>MD</code>语法</p>
</div>
 
 <div class="layui-tab-item">这是t2的内容</div></div>
</div>

<h2 id="timeline-时间轴" class="heading-element"><span>timeline-时间轴</span>
 <a href="#timeline-%e6%97%b6%e9%97%b4%e8%bd%b4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2>
<link href="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/css/layui.css" rel="stylesheet">

<script src="//unpkg.com/layui@2.9.3/dist/layui.js"></script><div class="layui-tab layui-tab-card" lay-filter="tabs-timeline" >
 <ul class="layui-tab-title"><li class="layui-this" >使用</li>
 
 <li>效果</li>

item.title: 毕少侠所有站点
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/images/posts/featured-image.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="blog" class="heading-element"><span>Blog</span>
 <a href="#blog" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="https://home.geekswg.top"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">主页<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><br>
<a href="https://geekswg.js.cool"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">毕少侠​<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><br>
<a href="https://geekswg.top"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">毕少侠​<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a><br>
<a href="https://blog.geekswg.top"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">毕少侠​<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>

<p><a href="https://github.com/gavinblog/picx"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">毕少侠-Picx-Github图床<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
<h2 id="评论系统" class="heading-element"><span>评论系统</span>
 <a href="#%e8%af%84%e8%ae%ba%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

item.title: timeline2
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/images/posts/featured-image-preview.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p><div class="details admonition quote open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-quote-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>quote<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">note abstract info tip success question warning failure danger bug example quote</div>
 </div>
</div><br>
这里使用MD语法编写你的文章</p>
<div class="main-container">
 <section id="timeline" class="timeline-outer">
 <div class="container" id="content">
 <div class="row">
 <div class="col s12 m12 l12">
 <ul class="timeline">

 

 



 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 




 




<li class="event" data-date='2023 05/21'>
 <h2>标题 [2023/05/21 -> 2023/05/22] </h2>
 
 <div class="moment" id="moment" style="color: #c41a16;text-align: right;position: absolute;top: 0;right: 0;padding: 5px;" >
 
 </div>
 
 <div>
 <h2 id="你好" class="heading-element"><span>你好</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bd%a0%e5%a5%bd" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>测试md 语法支持</p>
</blockquote>

 </div>
</li>




<script>
 function non0plural(number, name) {
 if (number == 0) {
 return ""
 }
 if (number > 1) {
 return number + " " + name + "s"
 }
 return number + " " +name
 }

 el = document.querySelector("#moment");
 function refresh() {
 start = dayjs("2023-05-21")
 now = dayjs()

 total_months = now.diff(start, "M", true)
 months = total_months % 12;
 days = now.diff(start, "day", true);
 years = Math.floor((total_months) / 12)
 el.innerHTML = non0plural(years,"year")+" " + non0plural(months.toFixed(2),"month")
 + "<br/><br/><br/>" + non0plural(days.toFixed(6),"day");
 }
 window.setInterval(refresh, 1000); 
</script>


 





 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 




 




<li class="event" data-date='2022 05/01'>
 <h2>Current position [2022/05/01 -> 2024/11/01] </h2>
 
 <div class="moment" style="color: #c41a16;text-align: right;position: absolute;top: 0;right: 0;padding: 5px;" >
 2 years 6 months 
 </div>
 
 <div>
 <p>I&rsquo;m working here 2</p>

 </div>
</li>




 





 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 




 




<li class="event" data-date='2020 01/02'>
 <h2>Old position [2020/01/02 -> 2024/11/01] </h2>
 
 <div class="moment" style="color: #c41a16;text-align: right;position: absolute;top: 0;right: 0;padding: 5px;" >
 4 years 10 months 
 </div>
 
 <div>
 <p>I worked here 1</p>

 </div>
</li>






 </ul>
 </div>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
</div>


<script src="https://geekswg.js.cool/js/dayjs.min.js"></script>
<style>
 

 
 


section.timeline-outer {
 width: 80%;
 margin: 0 auto;
}

h1.header {
 font-size: 50px;
 line-height: 70px;
}
 

.timeline {
 border-left: 8px solid #42A5F5;
 border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
 border-top-right-radius: 2px;
 box-shadow: 0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16), 0 2px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
 
 margin: 50px auto;
 letter-spacing: 0.5px;
 position: relative;
 line-height: 1.4em;
 padding: 20px;
 list-style: none !important;
 text-align: left;
}

.timeline h1,
.timeline h2,
.timeline h3 {
 font-size: 1.4em;
}

.timeline .event {
 border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(160, 160, 160, 0.2);
 padding-bottom: 15px;
 margin-bottom: 20px;
 position: relative;
}

.timeline .event:last-of-type {
 padding-bottom: 0;
 margin-bottom: 0;
 border: none;
}

.timeline .event:before,
.timeline .event:after {
 position: absolute;
 display: block;
 top: 0;
}

.timeline .event:before {
 left: -177.5px;
 color: #212121;
 content: attr(data-date);
 text-align: right;
 font-weight: 100;
 
 font-size: 16px;
 min-width: 120px;
}

.timeline .event:after {
 box-shadow: 0 0 0 8px #42A5F5;
 left: -50px;
 background: #212121; 
 border-radius: 50%;
 height: 11px;
 width: 11px;
 content: "";
 top: 5px;
}
 
 

@media (max-width: 945px) {
 .timeline .event::before {
 left: 0.5px;
 top: 20px;
 min-width: 0;
 font-size: 13px;
 }
 .timeline h3 {
 font-size: 16px;
 }
 .timeline p {
 padding-top: 20px;
 }
 section.lab h3.card-title {
 padding: 5px;
 font-size: 16px
 }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
 .timeline .event::before {
 left: 0.5px;
 top: 20px;
 min-width: 0;
 font-size: 13px;
 }
 .timeline .event:nth-child(1)::before,
 .timeline .event:nth-child(3)::before,
 .timeline .event:nth-child(5)::before {
 top: 38px;
 }
 .timeline h3 {
 font-size: 16px;
 }
 .timeline p {
 padding-top: 20px;
 }
}
 

a.portfolio-link {
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: block;
 text-align: center;
}

</style>


<h2 id="使用demo-timeline2" class="heading-element"><span>使用demo-timeline2</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8demo-timeline2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight" title="timeline2-demo"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{<span class="p">&lt;</span> <span class="nt">timeline2</span> <span class="p">&gt;</span>}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{{% tl-event2 title=&#34;标题&#34; from=&#34;2023-05-21&#34; to=&#34;2023-05-22&#34; %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">## 你好
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">&gt; 测试md 语法支持
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% /tl-event2 %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% tl-event2 title=&#34;Current position&#34; to=&#34;2023-02-01&#34; from=&#34;2022-05-01&#34; %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">I&#39;m working here 2
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% /tl-event2 %}}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">I worked here 1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {{% /tl-event2 %}}

item.title: WPS-AI内测使用体验
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/posts/2023/wps-ai-use/230529180454-wps-ai.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><div class="details admonition quote open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-quote-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>quote<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p><a href="https://ai.wps.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">WPS-AI官网<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
<blockquote>
<p>如何使用WPS AI帮助我们高效的写作<br>
在当今的数字化时代，我们的生活和工作节奏也在不断加快。为了更高效地处理工作，我们需要掌握一些工具和技巧。WPS AI，作为金山办公的人工智能助手，能够帮助我们更高效地进行写作。本文将详细介绍如何使用WPS AI帮助我们高效的写作。</p>
</blockquote>
</div>
 </div>
</div>
<h2 id="wps-ai介绍" class="heading-element"><span>WPS AI介绍</span>
 <a href="#wps-ai%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>WPS AI是金山办公与合作伙伴共同开发的AI创作助理，它能够理解自然语言并生成对应的回复。WPSAI善解人意、礼貌、诚实、知识丰富、乐于助人。它的回复应该内容翔实，有条理，有逻辑，非常实用。WPSAI思路清晰，逻辑严密，推理精确。WPSAI没有任何感情，不会评价和对比人物，不会拉踩，不谈政治。WPSAI不会给出虚假或误导性的信息。</p>
<h2 id="如何使用wps-ai帮助我们高效的写作" class="heading-element"><span>如何使用WPS-AI帮助我们高效的写作</span>
 <a href="#%e5%a6%82%e4%bd%95%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8wps-ai%e5%b8%ae%e5%8a%a9%e6%88%91%e4%bb%ac%e9%ab%98%e6%95%88%e7%9a%84%e5%86%99%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>撰写提纲<br>
WPS AI可以根据关键词自动生成提纲。当你选择了关键词，WPS AI会根据用户的写作需求生成对应的提纲。这对于撰写长篇文章和报告非常有帮助，它可以帮助用户在开始写作前了解文章的整体框架和脉络。</li>
<li>内容补充<br>
WPS AI可以针对提纲中的每个部分，自动生成内容。用户可以根据实际需求，对WPS AI生成的内容进行调整和补充，从而创作出符合要求的文章。此外，WPS AI还可以根据用户的反馈，自动调整和优化生成的内容。</li>
<li>提供相关资料<br>
WPS AI可以根据用户的写作需求，提供相关的资料和信息。例如，WPS AI可以根据文章的主题，为用户推荐相关的书籍、论文、案例等资料。这对于用户查找和获取写作素材，提高写作效率非常有帮助。</li>
<li>智能校对<br>
WPS AI可以对用户的文章进行智能校对。它能够检查拼写错误、语法错误、格式错误等问题，并给出修改建议。用户可以根据WPS AI的建议对文章进行修改，从而提高文章的质量。</li>
<li>智能排版<br>
WPS AI可以根据文章的主题和内容，对文章进行智能排版。它能够自动调整文章的字体、字号、颜色、段落间距等，从而使文章更加美观、易读。<br>
通过以上五个步骤，WPS AI可以帮助用户高效地完成写作任务。它不仅能够节省用户的时间和精力，还能提高文章的质量和可读性。<br>
总之，WPS AI是一个强大的写作工具，它可以帮助我们更高效地进行写作。通过使用WPS AI，我们可以提高工作效率，减轻写作压力，从而更好地应对数字化时代的挑战。</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="使用wps-ai的注意事项" class="heading-element"><span>使用WPS AI的注意事项</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8wps-ai%e7%9a%84%e6%b3%a8%e6%84%8f%e4%ba%8b%e9%a1%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>虽然WPS AI可以帮助我们更高效地进行写作，但是在使用过程中，我们还需要注意以下几点：</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>避免过度依赖</strong>：尽管WPS AI能够提供很多帮助，但我们仍然需要具备独立思考的能力。过度依赖WPS AI可能会削弱我们的写作能力，降低我们的写作水平。</li>
<li><strong>适度调整</strong>：WPS AI生成的内容需要根据实际需求进行适度调整。如果WPS AI生成的内容存在问题，我们需要及时进行修改和优化，以确保文章的质量。</li>
<li><strong>与WPS AI保持良好沟通</strong>：在使用WPS AI进行写作时，我们需要与WPS AI保持良好的沟通，及时了解其生成的内容和建议。同时，我们也要向WPS AI提供反馈，以便其更好地理解我们的需求和要求。</li>
<li><strong>注意隐私和安全</strong>：在使用WPS AI的过程中，我们需要注意保护自己的隐私和安全。不要在不安全的网络环境下使用WPS AI，并确保自己的账号和密码的安全性。<br>
通过以上几个方面的注意事项，我们可以更好地利用WPS AI进行写作，从而提高我们的工作效率和写作质量。</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="展望未来的wps-ai" class="heading-element"><span>展望未来的WPS AI</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b1%95%e6%9c%9b%e6%9c%aa%e6%9d%a5%e7%9a%84wps-ai" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>随着人工智能技术的发展，WPS AI的功能和性能将会得到进一步的提升。以下是对未来WPS AI的展望：</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>个性化推荐</strong>：WPS AI能够根据用户的喜好和需求，为其提供个性化的内容和建议。例如，WPS AI可以根据用户的写作风格和特点，为其推荐相关的书籍、文章和案例等。</li>
<li><strong>情感识别与表达</strong>：WPS AI能够识别和表达用户的情感。例如，当用户在写作中表达出喜悦、悲伤、愤怒等情感时，WPS AI可以自动调整回复的语气和措辞，以更好地与用户互动。</li>
<li><strong>更强的写作辅助功能</strong>：WPS AI能够提供更多的写作辅助功能，如生成文章摘要、提供写作灵感、评估文章质量等。这些功能将使WPS AI在写作过程中发挥更大的作用，帮助用户更高效地完成写作任务。</li>
<li><strong>实时协同写作</strong>：WPS AI将支持实时协同写作功能，使多个用户能够同时在同一篇文章上进行修改和编辑。这将大大提高团队合作的效率，缩短项目的完成时间。</li>
<li><strong>多语言支持</strong>：随着全球化的发展，WPS AI将支持更多的语言，以满足不同用户的需求。这将使WPS AI在全球范围内发挥更大的作用，帮助更多人提高写作效率。<br>
通过以上展望，我们可以预见，随着人工智能技术的不断发展，WPS AI将为我们的工作和生活带来更多的便利。我们期待着WPS AI在未来的发展和应用，以帮助我们更好地应对数字化时代的挑战。<br>
很抱歉，作为一个人工智能助手，我暂时无法回应这条指令，您可以尝试重新输入。</li>
</ol>
<blockquote>
<p>总结一下，WPS-AI使用起来，真的不错写作速度目前很快，写水文很给力，目前内测没有限制，以后估计会收费吧。</p>
</blockquote>

item.title: Website RIP 效果实现
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/images/posts/featured-image-preview.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">我们常常会在百度百科中看到有人去世时，关于ta的百度百科页会变成黑白色，而其他的无影响。这难道是又重新创建或者修改了整个网页的内容吗？那工作量和时间也来不及呀，其实不然，而是有一个属性，只需设置该属性就可以改变一整个网页的色调。</div>
 </div>
</div>
<blockquote>
<p>实现代码</p>
</blockquote>
<p>核心代码 <code>document.querySelector('html').style.filter = 'grayscale(100%)';</code></p>
<h2 id="具体js代码实现" class="heading-element"><span>具体js代码实现</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b7%e4%bd%93js%e4%bb%a3%e7%a0%81%e5%ae%9e%e7%8e%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>稍微封装了一下，方便维护日期和默哀提示消息，。</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="代码封装" class="heading-element"><span>代码封装</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bb%a3%e7%a0%81%e5%b0%81%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>使用Demo <code>RIP.isInRIP(RIP.rip_configs)</code><br>
只需要按照格式维护rip_configs就可以轻松实现整个网站默哀祭奠的效果了。</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span><span class="lnt">39
</span><span class="lnt">40
</span><span class="lnt">41
</span><span class="lnt">42
</span><span class="lnt">43
</span><span class="lnt">44
</span><span class="lnt">45
</span><span class="lnt">46
</span><span class="lnt">47
</span><span class="lnt">48
</span><span class="lnt">49
</span><span class="lnt">50
</span><span class="lnt">51
</span><span class="lnt">52
</span><span class="lnt">53
</span><span class="lnt">54
</span><span class="lnt">55
</span><span class="lnt">56
</span><span class="lnt">57
</span><span class="lnt">58
</span><span class="lnt">59
</span><span class="lnt">60
</span><span class="lnt">61
</span><span class="lnt">62
</span><span class="lnt">63
</span><span class="lnt">64
</span><span class="lnt">65
</span><span class="lnt">66
</span><span class="lnt">67
</span><span class="lnt">68
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-javascript" data-lang="javascript"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm">/**
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm"> * Rest in Peace. R.I.P 🕯️
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm"> * @2022-3-28 [3.21-mu5735] 沉痛哀悼 132 名遇难同胞：东航航班失事，遇难者含旅客 123 人，机组 9 人
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm"> * @2022-12-03 江泽民同志逝世，享年96岁
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm"> * @returns {Blog}
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm"> */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kr">const</span> <span class="nx">RIP</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// 配置信息
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">rip_configs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">type</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="s1">&#39;perYear&#39;</span> <span class="c1">// 重复方式 once , perYear , perMonth 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nb">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;2022/04/05 00:00:00&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// 开始时间 new Date(&#39;2022/12/03 00:00:00&#39;)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">duration</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">24</span> <span class="c1">// 持续时间 单位小时
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">msgOp</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(){</span> <span class="c1">//自定义操作，消息提醒等
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">alert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;清明节&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;清明节&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">type</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="s1">&#39;once&#39;</span> <span class="c1">// 重复方式 once , perYear , perMonth 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nb">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;2022/12/03 00:00:00&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// 开始时间 new Date(&#39;2022/12/03 00:00:00&#39;)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">duration</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">48</span> <span class="c1">// 持续时间 单位小时
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">msgOp</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(){</span> <span class="c1">//自定义操作，消息提醒等
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;祭奠日&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">isInRIP</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">rip_configs</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">nowTime</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{};</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">isRIP</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">//是否符合条件
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">nowTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">nowTime</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nb">Date</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//let type = &#39;once&#39; ;// once , perYear,perMonth,
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">//let startTime = null; //开始时间
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">//let duration = 24; //持续时间 单位H,小时
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="c1">//let msgOp = &#39;&#39;; //消息提示
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">rip_configs</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">forEach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">confs</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">info</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;rip_configs.forEach =&gt; &#39;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">index</span> <span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">dur</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">duration</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;once&#39;</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">type</span><span class="p">){</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;perYear&#39;</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">type</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setFullYear</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">nowTime</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getFullYear</span><span class="p">())</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">endTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nb">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getTime</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">dur</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">//console.log(&#34;开始=&gt;&#34;+startTime+&#34;\n&#34; + &#34;\n结束=&gt;&#34;+endTime);
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">nowTime</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nx">nowTime</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">endTime</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;RIP - Type : &#39;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">type</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">msgOp</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;开始=&gt;&#34;</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="s2">&#34;\n&#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&#34;\n结束=&gt;&#34;</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="nx">endTime</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">querySelector</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;html&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">style</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">filter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;grayscale(100%)&#39;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">RIP</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">isRIP</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">msgOp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">conf</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">msgOp</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">isRIP</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">isRIP</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">startTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">duration</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">dur</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">};</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">})();</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Build Cloud Disk - CloudReve
item.author: geekswg@qq.com (geekswg)
item.description:
<img src="https://geekswg.js.cool/images/posts/featured-image-preview.jpg" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title"><i class="icon fa-fw fa-solid fa-pencil-alt" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">今天介绍一下非常好用的私有云网盘系统。<br>
以 跨平|的方式组织你的文件。Cloudreve 可助你即刻构建出兼备自用或公用的网盘服务，通过多种存储策略的支持、虚拟文件系统等特性实现灵活的文件管理体验。</div>
 </div>
</div>
<p><a href="https://cloudreve.org/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">CloudReve官网地址<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
<p>现在的网盘吧，动不动就限速，内容还得需要审核，NAS把又太笨重了，自己搭一个私有云网盘，所有的权限都在自己手中放心，要是想其他人也可能访问，一个公网ip+【自定义域名】就ok了。<br>
Cloudreve 可以让您快速搭建起公私兼备的网盘系统。Cloudreve 在底层支持不同的云存储平台，用户在实际使用时无须关心物理存储方式。你可以使用 Cloudreve 搭建个人用网盘、文件分享系统，亦或是针对大小团体的公有云系统。</p>
<h2 id="为什么推荐cloudreve" class="heading-element"><span>为什么推荐CloudReve</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%ba%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88%e6%8e%a8%e8%8d%90cloudreve" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>国产，功能完善，中文文档齐全，其他的就不比较了。</li>
<li>社区版完全免费开源，比较纯粹，没有套路。</li>
<li>支持windows和linux，扩展性强。</li>
<li>Go语言重构了，作者666。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="快速开始" class="heading-element"><span>快速开始</span>
 <a href="#%e5%bf%ab%e9%80%9f%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>本来想写个教程的，但是把官网写的太好，太详细。<a href="https://docs.cloudreve.org/getting-started/install"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方教程<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>记录点注意事项：</p>
<ul>
<li>部署成功后，管理用户和密码都在控制台显示了，请自行保存。</li>
<li>windows部署超级简单就一个单文件，当时如果你的管理员密码不记得了，把程序根目录的 .db ，删掉，就可以重新部署程序了，重新生成了用户名和密码，相当于重置了整个系统，所以还是建议大家，一开始妥善保管，以免不必要麻烦。</li>
<li>该网盘默认使用sqlite数据库。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="遇到的问题" class="heading-element"><span>遇到的问题</span>
 <a href="#%e9%81%87%e5%88%b0%e7%9a%84%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>文档预览，内网预览 docs，无法使用</p>
</blockquote>
<p>解决方案：</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>使用 <a href="https://kkview.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">kkFileView<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> ,文档预览来替换。<br>
当时需要改造预览方法。由于cloudreve文件地址是不带后缀名的。而kkfileView预览地址是要带后缀名的。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用Web Application Open Platform Interface (WOPI) 协议是一种用于集成 Web 文档编辑器的协议，你可以在 微软的文档 中阅读详细的协议定义。Cloudreve 可以对接实现了 WOPI 协议的文档处理服务，用于扩展已有的文档预览和编辑能力。</p>
</li>
</ol>
